CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): obtaindrugcountry, B.4.k.2.3 (2A)
E2B (R3): G.k.2.4 Identification of the Country Where the Drug Was Obtained Conformance: Optional Data Type: 2A OID: 1.0.3166.1.2.2 Value Allowed: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2, EU
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This data element captures the country where the medicinal was obtained.
CustomField.label: Country Drug Obtained
